        <script><![CDATA[function setTaskAgileStoryColumnReadOnly() {
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
	
	gr.addQuery('name', 'task');
	gr.addQuery('element', 'agile_story');
	gr.addQuery('read_only', false);
	gr.query();
	
	if (gr.next()) {
		gr.setValue('read_only', true);

	}
}

setTaskAgileStoryColumnReadOnly();]]></script>
